page.title: 05Totteridge The Past.
page.content: Across from our school there are some bungalows where the old people live. {Rachel,Claire,Tracy}and I went to{Mr and{Mrs Page's}bungalow to ask what the area used to be like. She told us a lot of interesting things. They told us that all of{High Wycombe}used to be fields and Cherry orchards and there used to be a farm called{Kipples Farm along Hatters Lane.There were no roads or hardly any houses.{Mr and Mrs Page have lived in this area for about{80 years.Then we went to{Mrs Goss}and she told us that she would not live anywhere else but{High Wycombe}and she has lived in the area for{70 years. She told us that when she was{young the area was once all{grassland}and {woods.}It was{lovely.}She also told us that there weren't many{houses}around this{area.
